carrier_master.driver_satisfaction_notes: Family feel, respected in Memphis market. Drivers know management by name.
carrier_master.fit_rationale: Memphis HQ = closest Tier 1 prospect to West Memphis hub. 765 trucks dry van OTR. Donnie Caldwell (COO) previously at Empire Express = warm intro path. Strong family culture aligns with Outriders Club values.
carrier_master.primary_pitch_angle: Memphis neighbor — your drivers pass our hub daily
carrier_master.secondary_pitch_angle: Outriders Club as recruiting differentiator for 765-truck fleet competing against mega-carriers
carrier_master.warm_intro_path: Caldwell previously at Empire Express. Close Ozark first → Caldwell introduces to Tim Gatlin (Empire CEO).
carrier_master.strategic_multiplier: Ozark + Empire + Mid South = 3 Memphis-based carriers at LHS. West Memphis hub becomes Memphis trucking community gathering point.
carrier_master.exec_summary: Ozark Motor Lines is a privately held, Memphis-based dry van OTR carrier with 765 trucks and 2,500 trailers. Founded 1961. Strong family culture. COO Donnie Caldwell previously worked at Empire Express, creating the strongest warm-intro path in the pipeline. Memphis HQ makes this the geographic anchor for the West Memphis hub strategy.

carrier_contacts.title: Chief Operating Officer
carrier_contacts.notes: PRIMARY TARGET. Previously at Empire Express. Warm intro to Tim Gatlin.
